name: TotalCholesterol_Lab_Grouping
title: Total Cholesterol_Lab_Grouping
description: b.well created value set by Sr. Clinical Business Analyst for Total Cholesterol.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Total Cholesterol utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Data Element Scope: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Total Cholesterol utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Inclusion Criteria: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Total Cholesterol utilization in patients/users connected health.),(Exclusion Criteria: This value set's intent is to define the clinical codes that constitute the Total Cholesterol utilization in patients/users connected health.)

contains.display: Lipid panel results documented and reviewed (must include total cholesterol, HDL-C, triglycerides and calculated LDL-C) (CAD)
Lipid panel This panel must include the following: Cholesterol, serum, total (82465) Lipoprotein, direct measurement, high density cholesterol (HDL cholesterol) (83718) Triglycerides (84478)
Cholesterol, serum or whole blood, total
